com.percussion.pso.validation
Class PSOUniqueFieldWithInFoldersValidator

java.lang.Object
  com.percussion.pso.validation.PSOUniqueFieldWithInFoldersValidator
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.percussion.extension.IPSExtension, com.percussion.extension.IPSFieldValidator, com.percussion.extension.IPSUdfProcessor
public class PSOUniqueFieldWithInFoldersValidator
extends Object
implements com.percussion.extension.IPSFieldValidator

This is a field validator that checks whether or not a field is unique for all the folders that the item resides (or to be created) in.

There are 3 parameters:

  • The field value - defaults to the current value of the field.
  • The field name - defaults to the name of the current field.
  • Exclude Promotable Versions flag -- specify true or false
See the Extensions.xml for more information.

Author:
adamgent

See if a field value is unique in all the folders that the given existing item resides.

Parameters:
contentId - id of the item.
fieldName - field name to check for uniqueness.
fieldValue - the value of the field.
Returns:
true if its unique
